page.title: Plain Language Job Titles in Federal Government
page.metaTitle: Plain Language Job Titles in Federal Government
page.subtitle:
The 2210 series, or the Information Technology Management Series, is the largest tech-related occupational series in the federal government. While it sounds like tech support, people in this job series also include engineers, product managers, and even Chief Information Officers.

However, overwhelmingly, the job titles used to advertise for this role on USAJobs are some variation of 'IT Specialist', which makes it difficult for candidates to search for the jobs they're looking for.

legend.title: Size = Number of Job Announcements in 2024

scrollText.mainText: Each bubble represents a job title in the 2210 series:
scrollText.infoText: These are the top 200 job titles used to advertise for the 2210 series.
